body.name: Onutis Rubber Broom, Pet Dog Cat Hair Removal – Squeegee for Floor, Carpet Rake – Indoor and Outdoor - House Cleaning Supplies - Size 49 in x 42,5 in - Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 5 mins
features: 2-IN-1 BROOM : Our broom has holes for inserting a mop to transform your broom into a mop. You can also use the squeegee side to repel water. When you're done using it, simply hang it on the hole in the handle for storage.

COMFORTABLE TO USE : The top of the grip is comfortable, made of sponge so that your hands don't slip on the handle. What's more, the handle is made of high-quality aluminum, making the broom light and easy to handle.

ANTI ANIMAL HAIR : Our broom is perfect for removing pet hair, really effective for removing all the hair from your cats, dogs and other hairballs. No more vacuuming! Easier and quicker to sweep without getting too tired.

USE EVERYWHERE : Clean your floors, terraces, tiles, remove dirt wherever it's found, repel water, wash your pool, parquet, carpets in the living room, toilet, bathroom, bedroom. The rubber bristles can also be used for scrubbing the floor.
EASY TO CLEAN : After use, simply run the brush under water to get your broom clean again. You can even dismantle the aluminum handle to clean the brush more thoroughly if you wish.
body.description: Rubber / silicone brushes for cleaning floors, carpet terraces, removing pet hair, hair if you're a hairdresser and more! They feature holes for a mop and transform the broom into a mop. The handle is comfortable, and the shaft is made of lightweight aluminum. Turn it upside down to make a squeegee broom and repel water. We've worked out the perfect size, neither too small nor too big. And the handle is stable, so it won't unscrew during use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sweeping bird seed off the deck
reviews.reviewText: I use this to sweep birdseed off the deck. The rubber bristles don’t scratch the stained wood and make it easy to push seeds from under my feeders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does a Good Job
reviews.reviewText: This really is a game changer for hard floors. It was easy to assemble but after a few brushes you the mophead does come loose. So I had to add a little glue. It works fine now that it is more sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It picked up so much hair it's awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rubber broom is quite different than a standard broom and the overall design is quite good. In sweeping up a hardwood floor, this broom did a much better job than a regular broom in terms of not missing small pieces and with cat hair. With a normal broom, cat hair floats away, but with this broom, the cat hair was much more manageable and tended to stay in the swept up pile.The squeegee is a super nice feature as well. It is great for spills. With the rubber components, leaning this tool will be easy and it should dry quickly.My only complaint is that the handle is a little short. I am a little shorter than average and found that a longer handle would be helpful. The handle comes in three segments that are screwed together. Another two inches on each segment length would be better.Overall, I am happy with this broom and expect that it will completely replace my standard brooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Jusy but the more expensive one!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cheap rubber broom after my old trust one's handle broke in the middle. I had it for years. I didn't have much money but the rubber being are the best for cleaning up dog hair and I have 5 dogs! I bought this one too get by until payday. No. I should have just paid the extra $10 and got a better one. This one is really short. I'm 5'6" and it was hell on my back. The pole feels really don't like it's going to bend at any moment. The rubber part keeps popping out of the bottom so every few "sweeps" I have to put it back in, so does the top of the handle that has the hole for hanging. I'm going to glue both pieces in and keep it in the garage for outside but I already ordered a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great bristles, flimsy handle that is too short
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rubber broom to replace one that I bought years ago and that had finally given in. I was looking for a broom with a larger broom head with soft and elastic bristles (the original replacement I bought is too narrow and its bristles are too stiff), and this one delivers. It doesn't scratch the floors, picks up hair and dust well, and seems wide enough to help with general household chores (it won't get into every corner, but I wasn't looking for that). The "squeegee" side of the brush head seems sturdy and able to deal with water. The drawback: the broom's handle is really flimsy, will likely bend out of shape easily. And for a tall person (I am 5'10"), it is definitely way too short, a good 10 inches more would be much more useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Version of a Great Broom!
reviews.reviewText: Several years ago I purchased my first rubber broom and was amazed at the difference in using this style broom. Unfortunately, after purchasing several more as gifts the company quit making it. I tried another version but it was not near as good. When I found this one I hoped it would at least compare to my first rubber broom and indeed it does. The handle is not painted, thus no issue of paint pealing like the original one I had. The head of the broom is thicker and that is a wonderful change to pick up more of the tiny particles of dirt and grass that gets tracked in from the yard. This broom is not as tall as my others, but that is not a negative and makes storage easier. If you have never tried a rubber broom, I would strongly recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for removing hair from the floor.
reviews.reviewText: We use this in my salon for getting hair off entrance rugs when the vacuum can’t be used. It works wonderfully on hair on solid floors or brushing it off the carpet rugs.I appreciate the squeegee on the back side. We have had to use one after a water leak, and it worked amazingly at scooting the water where we needed it to go for cleanup.This broom has plastic pincher things (not sure what they’re called) where you can secure a towel on the end and use it as a mop (just like a Swiffer works).The handle is long and could be used comfortably by someone over 6’ tall. It is not the thickest aluminum, but it will work fine. If it ever breaks, the female end is universal, so you can just twist on your own broom handle from another broom/mop if it breaks or if you prefer a different kind.This is a solid choice for a broom where a vacuum isn’t practical. Hope this helps!
